title: WTB T205 Card Lots (Fair to VG)
author: Brailey

posts.post_title: WTB T205 Card Lots (Fair to VG)
posts.post_content:
I would like to buy some T205 lots (10 to 50+ cards).

Creases and general wear are fine but not interested in cards with holes, paper loss, missing pieces or writing.  

Lots with a good mixture of different backs, short runs, minor leaguers, minor stars HOF'ers preferred.

Please contact me at [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url] if you have any available with description and pricing.

Thanks,
Mike
Email:  [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url]
